name: "Wings" Quiz for True Fans 2 | Wings | 10 Questions

questions.text: How much money did Lowell lose gambling in Atlantic City?
questions.explanation:
$11,000.

	Joe, Brian, Faye, and Lowell went to Atlantic City for the weekend.  Roy asked him how much he lost and Lowell told him he only lost what he could afford to lose, which was $11,000.

questions.text: How many times was Helen married during the entire run of the show?
questions.explanation:
2.

	Helen married Antonio so that he could get his green card and stay in the country.  She got divorced from him when he won a green card in a government funded lottery.  Joe and Helen were married in what turned out to be a chaotic event.

questions.text: Which "Cheers" star appeared in the episode where Brian gets tickets to the Clint Black concert?
questions.explanation:
Kirstie Alley.

	Rebecca Howe (Kirstie Alley) appeared as a crazed fan of Clint Black.  She appeared in the after party scene and was thrown out by his bouncer.

questions.text: What was the name of Alex's dog that Joe watched for her while she went out of town one weekend?
questions.explanation:
Chopper.

	Alex named him Chopper because she flew them in Desert Storm.

questions.text: We were first introduced to Davis Lynch during which episode?
questions.explanation:
"Business or Pleasure".

	"Business or Pleasure" first aired on October 7, 1993.  In this episode, Davis Lynch is introduced as a potential investor for Sandpiper Air.  Upon his arrival, he takes a liking to Helen and Joe convinces her to go out with him.  They end up dating each other and Davis doesn't end up becoming an investor for the airline.

questions.text: What happened to Roy when he tried to sing "The Star Spangled Banner" at the opening of a Red Sox game?
questions.explanation:
he fainted.

	Roy was extremely nervous because he couldn't hit the high note.  After a little help from Helen he tried to do it again.  The microphone messed up at his second attempt and no one in the stadium could hear him hit the high note.  They ended up dragging him off of the field.

questions.text: How many episodes did William Hickey star in as Carlton Blanchard?
questions.explanation:
3.

	William Hickey played to perfection the annoying old man who asked a ton of questions.  His first appearance on "Wings" was in the episode "Das Plane" which originally aired on February 20, 1992.  He also starred in the episodes "The Houseguest" and "Say Uncle, Carlton".

questions.text: Tony Shaloub starred as Antonio Scarpacci in all eight seasons of "Wings".
questions.explanation:
False.

	Tony Shaloub was a regular cast member from 1991-1997.

questions.text: What is the name of Roy's ex-wife, the one that he talked about all of the time?
questions.explanation:
Sylvia.

	Roy told everyone that his wife was dead because he didn't want anyone to know that she left him.  Concetta Tomei played Sylvia in the episode "Roy Crazy" which originally aired on April 14, 1994.

questions.text: Tim Daly's real-life wife played which of the following characters in an episode of "Wings"?
questions.explanation:
Gwen.

	Amy Van Nostrand played Gwen Tucker in the episode "Have I Got a Couple for You" which originally aired on January 10, 1995.   This is the episode where Joe and Helen meet a new couple who have moved to the island. Joe and Helen become to needy and the couple "quits" them much to their despair.
